info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:27PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 615 PM MST... At 527 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Valley, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sahuarita, Green Valley and East Sahuarita. This includes Interstate 19 between mile markers 33 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
